desc: We are direct producers of cocoa from El Salvador, a vertically integrated supply chain, and we transform it into ceremonial cocoa and Bean to bar chocolate. A slow production starting from the cocoa bean. Our products are minimally processed and natural. Worked in Olbia in Sardinia. SHOP Online

layout.text: A New World of Cacao Love

We use Specialty Single-Estate cacaos from our family's farm Cuyancùa in El Salvador and from other small growers across Central America, and we craft it into delicious Ceremonial Cacao and Chocolates, enhancing the authenticity, and personality of each cacao!
CONSCIOUSLY SOURCED CACAO - SUSTAINABLE FARMINGVERTICALLY INTEGRATED
Bean-to-Bar in Small Batches
